task.description: A task in the task manager. Status is one of: todo, in-progress, done. Priority is one of: low, medium, high.

user.description: A user who can be assigned tasks

createTask.description: Create a new task. Body: { title, description?, status?, priority?, assignee? }

updateTask.description: Update an existing task. Body: { title?, description?, status?, priority?, assignee? }

listTasks.description: List all tasks. Returns an array of task objects. Supports query params: ?status=todo|in-progress|done&assignee=name

getTask.description: Get a single task by id

listUsers.description: List all users. Returns an array of user objects.
